name: Soul of Rhythm
description:
Operations: 

Press the button that appears on the screen to make the player dash towards the target. During the dash, the enemy can be killed, and the boss can be killed during the dash to the Space button.

You can only press the keyboard on the rhythm point！

Try to survive until the end of the song and it's better to play it in full-screen mode!

P.S. The shader animation of some game objects cannot run correctly in the HTML version. For a better gaming experience, please download the Windows version. (If you know how to solve this problem, don't hesitate to contact us)

Programmer: Jiaqu Wu

Artist: Siyuan Wang
